text: Jeremy James is an Anglican bishop in Australia. He was consecrated in August 2014 to serve as an assistant bishop in the Anglican Diocese of Perth."Consecration of Bishop Jeremy" James has degrees from both British and Australian universities. He served at Northam, East Avon, Yanchep, Quinns, Mindarie and Butler. He was the incumbent at Dianella before his episcopal appointment.Perth Anglican ==References== ==External links== Category:21st- century Anglican bishops Category:Living people Category:Assistant bishops in the Anglican Diocese of Perth Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Jeremy James (bishop)
